title: LOHAS-LED Night Light Plug in Wall, Plug in Night Light, Dusk to Dawn Sensor, 0-100LM Dimmable, 3000K Warm White, Flameless LED Candle Vintage Nightlight for Hallway, Bedroom, Kitchen, 2 Pack
features: Flameless Candle Style: This charming night light plug in wall features a lifelike LED candle shell with a soft glow. It mimics the warm, inviting light of a real candle, adding a cozy ambience and a decorative touch to your home.

Auto ON/OFF: With a built-in sensor, this LOHAS-LED night light automatically turns on at night and turns off in daylight. Enjoy hands-free convenience with this energy-saving automatic night light plug in.

Adjustable Brightness: This plug in night light emits a 3000K warm white light that’s gentle on the eyes. With a sliding dimmer (0–100 LM), it offers custom lighting—whether for a calming bedtime glow or brighter hallway visibility.

Safe & Energy Efficient: This realistic-looking flameless candle uses LED technology with no open flame, smoke, or hot wax. A safe, energy efficient lighting option for children’s rooms or pet-friendly homes.

Versatile Application: From cosy evenings to festive celebrations, our night lights are perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, hallways and entryways. They also add a warm glow to special occasions like Christmas, weddings and birthday parties.
description: LED Candle Night Light – Add Warmth and Safety to Your Home! Looking for a lighting solution that’s both stylish and practical? This LED Candle Night Light will bring a unique ambiance to your home, perfect for any room and even for special occasions. Soft, Steady Light – – The LED candle design provides a constant, soothing glow, creating a calm and peaceful atmosphere. It’s not just a functional light but a beautiful piece of home decor. Auto Light Control & Dimming – Featuring an automatic light control function, this night light turns on and off based on surrounding light. The smooth sliding dimmer allows you to adjust brightness from 0-100lm, catering to all your lighting needs. Safe Design for Family Use – The LED candle night light is safe for children and pets, with no concerns about hot wax or open flames. It’s a convenient, worry-free lighting option for any household.
